description: This topic course explores aspects of Film History intensively. Specific course topics vary from year to year. See the Cinema Studies website at <http://cinemastudies.sas.upenn.edu/> for a description of the current offerings.
name: TOPICS FILM HISTORY: Social Problem in Film: Race, Sexuality, Violence, Justice American Cinema
